AI.result: 观察到高度结构化的漫散射，在布里渊区边界有强强度，与Ce₂Hf₂O₇和Ce₂Zr₂O₇的宽漫散射不同。散射的Q依赖性与常用的近邻XYZ模型预测不符，但与经典偶极自旋冰的漫散射惊人相似。
AI.conclusion: 次近邻相互作用在决定Ce-焦绿石低能物理中起关键作用，当前理论框架需要修订以纳入这些效应，近邻XYZ模型不足以描述该体系。

title: First-Principle-Inspired Reduced-Order Models of Chemical-Kinetics in $\text{H}_2\left(\text{X}^1Σ_g^+\right)$+$\text{H}\left({}^2\text{S}\right)$ System
summary: In the present study, two-different reduced-order models are proposed for $\text{H}_2\left(\text{X}^1Σ_g^+\right)$+$\text{H}\left({}^2\text{S}\right)$ system by leveraging first-principle quasi-classical trajectory simulations and in-depth master equation analyses. The most recent available ab-initio potential energy surface is adopted to construct a new set of rovibrational state-to-state kinetic database valid over a wide range of temperatures. Firstly, a modified two-temperature model is proposed by incorporating the master equation-informed model parameters, enabling the advanced treatment of the internal energy coupling and the nonequilibrium dissociation predictions. Secondly, a hybrid coarse-graining model is proposed by combining a graph-based approach optimized globally for a wide range of temperatures with a centrifugal-barrier-based coarse-graining method. The proposed reduced-order models offer significantly improved accuracy in predicting the nonequilibrium energy transfer and dissociation dynamics compared to the existing coarse-graining and 2T models in previous studies. In addition, aerothermal heating prediction relevant to Uranus planetary entry reveals 16.5% of convective heat flux discrepancy compared to the present modified 2T approach with the existing 2T, demonstrating the importance of accurate modeling of the chemical-kinetics in the $\text{H}_2\left(\text{X}^1Σ_g^+\right)$+$\text{H}\left({}^2\text{S}\right)$ system.

AI.tldr: 本文针对H₂+H系统提出了两种降阶模型：改进的双温度模型和混合粗粒化模型，用于更准确地预测非平衡能量转移和离解动力学，并应用于天王星进入的热流预测。
AI.motivation: 现有粗粒化和双温度模型在预测H₂+H系统的非平衡能量转移和离解动力学方面存在精度不足的问题，特别是在行星进入等高温非平衡条件下，需要更准确的化学动力学模型来预测热流。
AI.method: 1) 利用第一性原理准经典轨迹模拟和主方程分析构建新的振动-转动态-态动力学数据库；2) 提出改进的双温度模型，融入主方程信息化的模型参数；3) 提出混合粗粒化模型，结合基于图的方法和基于离心势垒的粗粒化方法。
AI.result: 提出的降阶模型相比现有模型在预测非平衡能量转移和离解动力学方面显著提高了精度。在天王星进入的热流预测中，与现有双温度模型相比，改进的双温度模型显示出16.5%的对流热流差异。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的两种降阶模型为H₂+H系统提供了更准确的化学动力学建模方法，证明了在行星进入等高温非平衡条件下精确化学动力学建模的重要性，改进的双温度模型在热流预测中表现出显著优势。

title: Field induced superconductivity in a magnetically doped two-dimensional crystal
summary: Magnetic field induced superconductivity is a rare property in nature due to the sensitivity of spin-singlet Cooper pairing to time-reversal symmetry breaking perturbations. However, in rare cases, an interplay between magnetic fields and ions can be engineered to bring about superconductivity at finite fields. Here we use ultra-thin LaSb$_2$ doped with dilute Ce paramagnetic impurities to demonstrate a magnetic field-induced superconducting dome in a two-dimensional crystal. The reduced dimensionality of the structure enables the use of an in-plane magnetic field to dynamically suppress spin fluctuations on the Ce-site, which leads to an anomalous enhancement of the critical temperature with increasing field. By modelling the spin scattering dynamics across the experimental parameter space, we reveal insight into the complex nature of paramagnetic impurities in magnetic fields at low temperature, and how their manipulation can result in the ability to tune between competing magnetic pair-breaking regimes. Realizing this physics in a two-dimensional crystalline setting invites the application of similar approaches to unconventional forms of superconductivity while also highlighting new experimental standards which should be employed when studying ultra-thin materials in general.

AI.tldr: 在超薄LaSb₂中掺杂稀少的Ce顺磁杂质，实现了磁场诱导的二维超导穹顶，通过面内磁场动态抑制Ce位点的自旋涨落，反常地增强了临界温度。
AI.motivation: 磁场诱导超导在自然界中很罕见，因为自旋单重态库珀配对对时间反演对称性破缺扰动很敏感。研究如何在二维晶体中通过磁场和杂质相互作用实现超导，探索调控竞争磁对破缺机制的可能性。
AI.method: 使用超薄LaSb₂掺杂稀少的Ce顺磁杂质，施加面内磁场动态抑制Ce位点的自旋涨落，通过建模自旋散射动力学来分析实验参数空间。
AI.result: 实现了磁场诱导的二维超导穹顶，观察到临界温度随磁场增加而反常增强的现象，揭示了顺磁杂质在低温磁场中的复杂性质。
AI.conclusion: 在二维晶体中实现这种物理机制，为探索非常规超导形式提供了新途径，同时强调了研究超薄材料时应采用的新实验标准。

title: Mechanical sensing of metamagnetic tricriticality in two-dimensional CrI3
summary: Layered Ising metamagnets are antiferromagnetic (AF) materials consisting of monolayer Ising ferromagnets coupled to each other via interlayer AF interactions. They exhibit rich magnetic phase diagrams, featuring tricritical and critical end points, due to the competing magnetic interactions and the Ising anisotropy. While conventional thermodynamic probes can identify these critical points in bulk Ising metamagnets, achieving this in the two-dimensional (2D) limit, where enhanced fluctuation effects can substantially modify critical phenomena, remains to be realized. Here, we combine specific heat capacity (C_V) and magnetic circular dichroism measurements to identify these critical points, extract a tricritical exponent, and map out the complete magnetic phase diagram of 2D Ising metamagnetic CrI3. This is achieved in a nanomechanical device of 6-layer CrI3, in which a direct measurement of the temperature derivative of its mechanical resonance frequency gives C_V. The tricritical point is identified by the onset of an abrupt spin-flip transition on one side and, on the other side, by a vanishing specific heat λ-anomaly for a continuous AF phase transition. In contrast, only the spin-flip transition remains near the critical end point. Our results establish nanomechanical calorimetry as a general route to classify metamagnetic phase transitions and to study multicritical phenomena in 2D magnets.

AI.tldr: 该研究结合比热容和磁圆二色性测量，在二维CrI3伊辛亚磁体中识别了临界点，提取了三临界指数，并绘制了完整的磁相图。
AI.motivation: 传统热力学探针可以在体材料中识别伊辛亚磁体的临界点，但在二维极限下，增强的涨落效应会显著改变临界现象，这尚未实现。
AI.method: 使用纳米机械装置测量6层CrI3，通过测量机械共振频率的温度导数获得比热容，并结合磁圆二色性测量。
AI.result: 成功识别了三临界点和临界端点，提取了三临界指数，绘制了完整的二维CrI3磁相图。
AI.conclusion: 纳米机械量热法为分类亚磁相变和研究二维磁体中的多临界现象提供了一条通用途径。

title: Contrasting impurity-induced magnetism and dynamics in 2H-MoTe2
summary: We investigate the behavior of interstitial $^8$Li$^+$ implanted near the surface of 2H-MoTe$_2$ using $β$-detected NMR. We find that, unlike the muon, $^8$Li$^+$ does not show any signature of induced magnetism. This result is consistent with density functional theory, which identifies the Li stopping site at the 2a Wyckoff position in the van der Waals gap and confirms the absence of detectable Li-induced electronic spin polarization. Both the spin-lattice relaxation and the resonance lines show evidence of strong spin dynamics above $\sim 200$ K, reminiscent of local stochastic $^8$Li$^+$ motion within a cage. The resonance line shape consists of quadrupolar satellites on top of a broad central peak. To better understand the interaction of $^8$Li$^+$ with the host material, we employ a frequency-comb measurement, by simultaneously exciting four frequencies corresponding to the first-order quadrupolar satellite transitions, $ν_0 \pm 3ν_{\mathrm{comb}}$ and $ν_0 \pmν_{\mathrm{comb}}$ around the Larmor frequency $ν_0$ as a function of $ν_{\mathrm{comb}}$. This offers an enhanced sensitivity to the quadrupolar split portion of the line. Using this method, we find a small decrease of the quadrupolar frequency with increasing temperature, showing the typical behavior associated with thermally excited phonons and the absence of any magnetic response which was observed with other defects in 2H-MoTe$_2$.

AI.tldr: 使用β-NMR研究2H-MoTe₂中Li⁺的行为，发现与μ子不同，Li⁺不诱导磁性，且观察到强自旋动力学和四极卫星共振谱线
AI.motivation: 研究2H-MoTe₂中Li⁺缺陷的行为，特别是与先前观察到的μ子诱导磁性的对比，以及Li⁺与宿主材料的相互作用机制
AI.method: 使用β-探测NMR技术，结合密度泛函理论计算确定Li停止位点，采用频率梳测量方法增强四极分裂谱的灵敏度
AI.result: Li⁺位于范德瓦尔斯间隙的2a Wyckoff位置，不诱导可检测的电子自旋极化；观察到强自旋动力学和四极卫星共振；四极频率随温度升高而略微减小
AI.conclusion: Li⁺在2H-MoTe₂中的行为与μ子不同，不诱导磁性，其四极相互作用表现出典型的声子热激发行为，与先前观察到的其他缺陷的磁响应形成对比

title: Stripe antiferromagnetism and chiral superconductivity in tWSe$_2$
summary: The layer-dependent Hamiltonians of parallel-stacked MoTe$_2$ and WSe$_2$ homobilayer moiré materials are topologically non-trivial, both in real space and in momentum space, and have been shown to support integer and fractional quantum anomalous Hall states, as well as antiferromagnetic and superconducting states. Here, we address the interplay between the antiferromagnetic and superconducting states observed in tWSe$_2$ when the Fermi level is close to its $M$-point van Hove singularity and the displacement field is small. We combine DFT with path-integrals to construct a minimal moiré band model that accounts for lattice relaxation along the $c$-axis and perform Hartree-Fock calculations to identify competing charge and spin ordered states. For tWSe$_2$ at $θ=2.7^\circ$ and $θ=3.65^\circ$, we find that a layer antiferromagnet (AFM), a stripe spin-density-wave (SDW), and the ferromagnetic Chern insulator (FM) are the primary candidates for the ground state at zero displacement field, and argue that antiferromagnetic spin interactions on the next neighbor bond $J_2$ can induce a time-reversal symmetry breaking chiral superconducting state.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了tWSe2中反铁磁态与超导态的相互作用，发现在M点van Hove奇点附近，层间反铁磁态、条纹自旋密度波和铁磁陈绝缘体是零位移场下的主要基态候选，并提出次近邻反铁磁相互作用可诱导时间反演对称性破缺的手性超导态。
AI.motivation: 研究MoTe2和WSe2同质双层莫尔材料中拓扑非平凡哈密顿量的物理性质，特别关注tWSe2在费米能级接近M点van Hove奇点且位移场较小时，反铁磁态与超导态之间的相互作用机制。
AI.method: 结合密度泛函理论(DFT)与路径积分方法构建考虑c轴晶格弛豫的最小莫尔能带模型，通过哈特里-福克计算识别竞争性的电荷和自旋有序态，分析不同扭转角度下的基态候选。
AI.result: 对于扭转角θ=2.7°和3.65°的tWSe2，发现层间反铁磁态(AFM)、条纹自旋密度波(SDW)和铁磁陈绝缘体(FM)是零位移场下的主要基态候选，并证明次近邻键上的反铁磁相互作用J2可诱导时间反演对称性破缺的手性超导态。
AI.conclusion: tWSe2莫尔材料中反铁磁相互作用与超导态之间存在密切关联，次近邻反铁磁相互作用可作为手性超导态的驱动机制，为理解莫尔材料中电子关联与拓扑性质的关系提供了新视角。

title: Exchange-dominated origin of spin-wave nonreciprocity in planar magnetic multilayers
summary: Spin-wave nonreciprocity, manifested as a frequency difference between counterpropagating modes, underpins many proposed magnonic devices. While this effect is commonly attributed to dipolar interactions or interfacial chirality, the microscopic origin of nonreciprocal dispersion in magnetic multilayers remains under debate. Here, we analyze nonreciprocal spin-wave dispersion in planar multilayer heterostructures without Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction. Using a frequency-shift dynamic matrix and an interaction-resolved dynamic energy-density formalism, we show that the frequency asymmetry cannot generally be ascribed to dipolar effects alone. Instead, once counterpropagating modes differ in their geometric structure along the thickness, interlayer exchange dominates the frequency shift. Applied to representative multilayer systems, we find that the interlayer exchange contribution exceeds dipolar and intralayer exchange effects by up to two to three orders of magnitude over a broad wave-vector range. Our results establish interlayer exchange as the primary mechanism controlling nonreciprocal dispersion in multilayer magnonic systems and provide a quantitative framework for engineering large frequency shifts in nonreciprocal magnonic devices.

AI.tldr: 该研究揭示了多层磁性异质结构中自旋波非互易性的主要机制是层间交换作用，而非传统认为的偶极相互作用，层间交换贡献比偶极和层内交换效应大2-3个数量级。
AI.motivation: 自旋波非互易性（反向传播模式频率差异）是许多磁子器件的基础，但传统上主要归因于偶极相互作用或界面手性，多层磁性结构中非互易色散的微观起源仍存在争议，需要澄清其物理机制。
AI.method: 采用频率偏移动态矩阵和相互作用分辨动态能量密度形式体系，分析无Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya相互作用的平面多层异质结构中的非互易自旋波色散，特别关注反向传播模式在厚度方向几何结构差异的影响。
AI.result: 研究发现频率不对称性不能仅归因于偶极效应，当反向传播模式在厚度方向几何结构不同时，层间交换作用主导频率偏移；在典型多层系统中，层间交换贡献在宽波矢范围内比偶极和层内交换效应大2-3个数量级。
AI.conclusion: 层间交换作用是控制多层磁子系统非互易色散的主要机制，为工程化非互易磁子器件中的大频率偏移提供了定量框架。

title: Topological-transition-driven Giant Enhancement of Second-harmonic Generation in Ferroelectric Bismuth Monolayer
comment: Submitted to Physical Review Letters (under review)
summary: The interplay between band topology and light in condensed materials could unlock intriguing nonlinear optical phenomena, enabling modern photonic technologies such as quantum light sources and sub-wavelength topological lasers. Here, we unveil that a buckling-tuned topological transition in ferroelectric bismuth monolayer unleashes a giant second-harmonic generation. Using first-principles calculations, we surprisingly find that ferroelectric bismuth monolayer with a buckling parameter, $Δh$, has a large susceptibility $χ^{(2)}$ on the order of $10^{7}$ $\mathrm{pm}^2/\mathrm{V}$, exceeding monolayer MoS$_2$ by about two orders of magnitude. When $Δh$ is engineered to the critical window where Dirac electrons emerge, a low-frequency resonance appears, boosting $χ^{(2)}$ by an additional order of magnitude. We show that this enhancement is localized on the Dirac cones and dominated by intraband modification contributions. Based on an extended Dirac model, we establish that this enhancement physically originates from the ultralight effective masses $m^{*}$ of Dirac electrons through scaling with the Fermi velocity $v_F$ and band gap $E_g$. Our findings provide a general paradigm for achieving exceptional second-harmonic generation via engineering topological criticality, and could serve as an experimental signature of Dirac electrons in topological materials.

AI.tldr: 铁电铋单层膜通过屈曲调控拓扑相变实现巨大二次谐波产生，其非线性系数比MoS₂单层高两个数量级，在狄拉克电子出现的临界窗口进一步增强一个数量级。
AI.motivation: 探索能带拓扑与光的相互作用，以解锁非线性光学现象，为量子光源和亚波长拓扑激光器等现代光子技术提供基础。
AI.method: 使用第一性原理计算研究铁电铋单层膜的屈曲参数Δh对二次谐波产生的影响，建立扩展狄拉克模型分析物理机制。
AI.result: 发现铁电铋单层膜具有约10⁷ pm²/V的巨大二次谐波系数，比MoS₂单层高两个数量级；在狄拉克电子出现的临界窗口，该系数再增强一个数量级，增强主要源于狄拉克锥上的带内修正贡献。
AI.conclusion: 通过工程拓扑临界性实现卓越二次谐波产生的一般范式，可作为拓扑材料中狄拉克电子的实验特征。

title: A Purely Magnetic Route to High-Harmonic Spin Pumping
summary: Spin pumping provides a fundamental route for dynamical spin transport, yet in its conventional form it produces only linear spin responses at the driving frequency. Recent studies have shown that spin-orbit coupling (SOC) can lift these restrictions and enable highly nonlinear spin and charge currents. Here we propose a distinct mechanism for high-harmonic spin pumping that does not rely on spin-orbit interactions. We show that nonlinearities in the adiabatic energy spectrum--rather than SOC itself--constitute the essential ingredient for high-harmonic generation in pumped spin currents. Such nonlinearities can arise in purely magnetic systems when a secondary magnetic order parameter is introduced perpendicular to the cone axis of a precessing magnetic moment. As a result, spin pumping and its higher harmonics emerge even in the complete absence of SOC. Our findings establish a new route to ultrafast spin pumping based solely on magnetic structure and dynamics.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种不依赖自旋轨道耦合的高次谐波自旋泵浦新机制，基于绝热能谱的非线性而非SOC
AI.motivation: 传统自旋泵浦只能产生线性响应，而自旋轨道耦合虽然能实现非线性响应，但本文希望探索不依赖SOC的新机制
AI.method: 通过引入垂直于进动磁矩锥轴的次级磁序参数，在纯磁系统中产生绝热能谱的非线性，从而实现高次谐波自旋泵浦
AI.result: 即使在完全不存在自旋轨道耦合的情况下，也能产生自旋泵浦及其高次谐波
AI.conclusion: 建立了一种仅基于磁结构和动力学的超快自旋泵浦新途径

title: Epitaxial Ni/Cu Superlattice Nanowires with Atomically Sharp Interfaces for Spin Transport
summary: The importance of microstructure increases when decreasing the size of an object to the nanoscale, along with the complexity of controlling it. For instance, it is particularly complicated to create nano-object with controlled interfaces. Therefore, progressing towards 1D epitaxial nanostructures poses a challenge, and realization of their full potential is linked to technological issues of achieving large-scale, precise atom stacking of two or more different chemical elements. Achieving such coherent, epitaxial interfaces is a key step toward enabling spintronic phenomena in 1D objects, by minimizing interface scattering and strain-driven defects. Our results demonstrate a successful realization of controlled nanoscale heteroepitaxy in one-dimensional single-crystal structures. We fabricated nanowires composed of alternating magnetic (nickel) and non-magnetic, highly conductive (copper) segments. This periodic stacking modulates electron transport under magnetic stimuli. The epitaxial precision achieved eliminates detrimental electron scattering that has historically limited the magnetotransport properties of such 1D structures and hindered their development. Such materials are crucial for further advancements in the miniaturisation of nanosensors, actuators, and next-generation 3D spintronic devices.

AI.tldr: 成功实现一维单晶结构中可控纳米级异质外延，制备了镍-铜交替的磁性/非磁性纳米线，其周期性堆叠在磁场刺激下调制电子输运，为纳米传感器和3D自旋电子器件发展奠定基础。
AI.motivation: 随着物体尺寸减小到纳米尺度，微结构的重要性增加，但控制界面变得复杂。实现一维外延纳米结构面临挑战，其潜力发挥依赖于大规模、精确堆叠不同化学元素的技术问题。实现相干外延界面是减少界面散射和应变缺陷、实现一维结构中自旋电子现象的关键。
AI.method: 采用可控纳米级异质外延技术，制备一维单晶纳米线，由交替的磁性（镍）和非磁性高导电性（铜）段组成，形成周期性堆叠结构。
AI.result: 成功实现了精确的外延控制，消除了有害的电子散射，调制了在磁场刺激下的电子输运。这种材料显著改善了磁输运性能，解决了历史上限制此类一维结构发展的瓶颈。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为一维异质外延纳米结构提供了可行方案，为纳米传感器、执行器和下一代3D自旋电子器件的微型化发展奠定了材料基础，推动了纳米尺度界面控制技术的发展。

title: Silicon Driven Facet Regulation Enables Tunable Micro-Diamond Architectures in Liquid Ga In
summary: We report an ambient pressure liquid metal assisted CVD strategy that enables shape programmable growth of micro scale diamond by coupling liquid metl Ga In with ferrocene (Fe(C5H5)2) as an carbon precursor, nanodiamond seeds, and nanosilicon. Building on liquid metal diamond synthesis, this approach pushes liquid metal growth toward a low temperature (900 °C, 1 atm) while enabling single crystal diamonds to be scaled from ~10 μm to several tens of micrometers with well developed faceting. Ferrocene decomposition supplies a sustained interfacial carbon flux that is captured and redistributed by the Ga In melt toward seed rich liquid solid interfaces. Defect rich nanodiamond provides the crystallographic template required for reliable sp3 nucleation despite the intrinsically low carbon solubility of Ga In. Nanosilicon plays a distinct, complementary role by tuning interfacial kinetics and facet competition, enabling deliberate control of crystal habit: cubic (~10 μm), truncated tetrahedral, and fully faceted octahedral diamonds are reproducibly obtained by adjusting the nanosilicon:nanodiamond ratio, with octahedral crystals reaching ~50 μm. Importantly, crystal size is further scaled by regulating hydrogen flow: lowering the H2 rate increases net carbon retention at the liquid metal interface, raises effective supersaturation, and accelerates diamond deposition. Together, habit control (via nanosilicon: nanodiamond) and size scaling (via H2 flow) establish a practical route silicon driven facet regulation and size under ambient pressure, offering a pathway to tunable micro sized single crystal diamonds under mild conditions.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种环境压力下液态金属辅助CVD方法，通过耦合Ga-In液态金属、二茂铁碳源、纳米金刚石种子和纳米硅，实现了微米级单晶金刚石的可编程形状生长，可在900°C低温下制备尺寸达50μm的立方、截角四面体和八面体金刚石晶体。
AI.motivation: 传统金刚石合成通常需要高压高温条件，限制了其应用范围。本研究旨在开发一种在环境压力下、相对低温条件下合成微米级单晶金刚石的方法，实现晶体形状和尺寸的可控生长。
AI.method: 采用液态金属Ga-In辅助CVD策略，耦合二茂铁作为碳源、纳米金刚石作为种子、纳米硅作为界面调节剂。通过调节纳米硅与纳米金刚石的比例控制晶体形状，通过调节氢气流量控制晶体尺寸，在900°C、1atm条件下实现金刚石的可编程生长。
AI.result: 成功在环境压力下实现了微米级单晶金刚石的可控生长：通过调节纳米硅:纳米金刚石比例，可重复获得立方体(~10μm)、截角四面体和完全面化的八面体(~50μm)金刚石晶体；通过降低H2流量可提高碳保留率，增加有效过饱和度，加速金刚石沉积并扩大晶体尺寸。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了一种通过纳米硅驱动晶面调控和氢气流量控制尺寸的实用方法，为在温和条件下合成可调谐微米级单晶金刚石提供了新途径，将液态金属生长推向低温环境压力领域。

title: Topological Polar Textures in Freestanding Ultrathin Ferroelectric Oxides
summary: The remarkable advances achieved in two-dimensional materials are now being directly transposed to low-dimensional oxides. Here we show using first-principles-based atomistic simulations that ultrathin freestanding ferroelectric layers host a rich variety of polar states, from liquid-like ferroelectric domains with long-range orientational order to helix-wave and chiral bubbles configurations reminiscent of those observed in twisted freestanding oxide layers. Time-dependent electric fields enable reversible control, revealing freestanding oxide layers as ideal platforms to explore complex polar states and their potential applications in future ferroic devices.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过第一性原理模拟发现超薄独立铁电层中存在多种极性态，包括类液体铁电畴、螺旋波和手性气泡等复杂结构，可通过时变电场可逆控制，为未来铁电器件提供了理想平台。
AI.motivation: 将二维材料的显著进展扩展到低维氧化物领域，探索独立氧化物层中复杂的极性状态及其在铁电器件中的潜在应用。
AI.method: 采用基于第一性原理的原子模拟方法，研究超薄独立铁电层中的极性状态。
AI.result: 发现独立铁电层中存在丰富的极性状态：具有长程取向有序的类液体铁电畴、螺旋波和手性气泡构型，这些构型与扭曲独立氧化物层中观察到的结构相似。时变电场能够实现对这些状态的可逆控制。
AI.conclusion: 独立氧化物层是探索复杂极性状态及其在未来铁电器件中应用的理想平台。

title: Impact of O concentration on the thermal stability and decomposition mechanism of (Cr,Al)N compared to (Ti,Al)N thin films
summary: The composition-dependent thermal stability of (Cr$_{0.47 \mp 0.03}$Al$_{0.53 \mp 0.03}$)$_{z}$(O$_{y}$N$_{1-y}$)$_{1-z}$ thin films with O concentrations of y = 0, 0.15, and 0.40 is investigated up to 1200 °C and then compared to (Ti$_{0.56}$Al$_{0.44}$)$_{z}$(O$_{y}$N$_{1-y}$)$_{1-z}$. X-ray diffraction reveals a thermal stability limit of 1150 °C independent of the O concentration, as witnessed by the formation of decomposition products, namely h-Cr$_{2}$N for (Cr$_{0.50}$Al$_{0.50}$)$_{0.49}$N$_{0.51}$ and c-Cr for both (Cr$_{0.48}$Al$_{0.52}$)$_{0.48}$(O$_{0.15}$N$_{0.85}$)$_{0.52}$ and (Cr$_{0.44}$Al$_{0.56}$)$_{0.46}$(O$_{0.40}$N$_{0.60}$)$_{0.54}$. Based on TEM and ERDA data, the thermal stability limit is extended to 1100 - 1150 °C. DFT calculations indicate that bond breaking limits the thermal stability. In (Cr,Al)N, N has the lowest activation energy for migration. Furthermore, the O vacancy formation energy is highest in (Cr,Al)(O,N). It has to be overcome to enable diffusion on the non-metal sublattice, which is necessary for forming decomposition products like w-AlN or c-Cr. However, once Cr-N bonds break, decomposition into h-Cr$_{2}$N and subsequent c-Cr together with N$_{2}$ is triggered. This results in N evaporation, generating sufficient non-metal vacancies that greatly enhance diffusion and render the extensive vacancy formation energies for non-metals irrelevant. This reduction of the activation energy for mass transport on the non-metal sublattice to the migration barrier causes the similar thermal stability in (Cr$_{0.47 \mp 0.03}$Al$_{0.53 \mp 0.03}$)$_{z}$(O$_{y}$N$_{1-y}$)$_{1-z}$. In contrast, Al bonds break first without creating non-metal vacancies in (Ti,Al)(O,N). Thus, the high O vacancy formation energy in (Ti,Al)(O,N) significantly increases the thermal stability compared to (Ti,Al)N as well as the here investigated films.

AI.tldr: 研究(Cr,Al)(O,N)薄膜的热稳定性，发现其热稳定极限为1150°C，与氧浓度无关，而(Ti,Al)(O,N)因氧空位形成能高而具有更高的热稳定性。
AI.motivation: 研究不同氧浓度的(Cr,Al)(O,N)薄膜的热稳定性，并与(Ti,Al)(O,N)进行比较，以了解氧掺杂对热稳定性的影响机制。
AI.method: 使用X射线衍射(XRD)分析薄膜在高达1200°C下的热稳定性，结合透射电子显微镜(TEM)和弹性反冲探测分析(ERDA)，并通过密度泛函理论(DFT)计算键断裂和空位形成能。
AI.result: (Cr,Al)(O,N)薄膜的热稳定极限为1150°C，与氧浓度无关。分解产物包括h-Cr₂N和c-Cr。DFT计算表明键断裂限制了热稳定性，Cr-N键断裂触发分解并产生氮空位，从而增强扩散。
AI.conclusion: (Cr,Al)(O,N)的热稳定性主要由Cr-N键断裂控制，而(Ti,Al)(O,N)中Al键先断裂且氧空位形成能高，因此具有更高的热稳定性。氧掺杂对(Cr,Al)(O,N)的热稳定性影响有限。

title: Manipulating ferroelectricity without electrical bias: A perspective
summary: Ferroelectric materials are established candidates for beyond complementary metal-oxide-semiconductor technology, owing to their non-volatile spontaneous electrical polarization. The recent boom in electric dipole texture engineering and manipulation in such materials has revealed exciting routes for controlling ferroelectric polarization, offering alternatives to the classical, sometimes challenging, application of electrical fields. In this short perspective, we shed light on electrode-free external stimuli enabling control over polar states in thin films. We bring awareness to the polarizing role of chemically-engineered surface contributions and provide insights into the combination of chemical substitution and mechanical pressure, complementing the polar state tuning capabilities readily enabled by flexoelectricity. Finally, we describe recent developments in the optical modulation of polarization. Thus, our perspective aims to stimulate the advancement of alternative means to act on polarization states and facilitate the development of ferroelectric-based applications.

AI.tldr: 本文综述了铁电材料中无需电极的外部刺激调控极化状态的新方法，包括化学工程表面贡献、化学替代与机械压力结合、挠曲电效应和光学调制等替代途径。
AI.motivation: 铁电材料因其非易失性自发电极化特性，是超越CMOS技术的候选材料。传统电场调控方法有时具有挑战性，需要探索无需电极的外部刺激来调控极化状态，为铁电应用开发提供替代方案。
AI.method: 通过短篇视角综述，重点介绍电极自由的外部刺激方法：1）化学工程表面贡献的极化作用；2）化学替代与机械压力结合；3）挠曲电效应提供的极化状态调控能力；4）光学调制极化技术的最新进展。
AI.result: 系统梳理了多种无需电极的极化状态调控途径，展示了化学、机械和光学方法在铁电薄膜中调控极化的潜力，为替代传统电场调控提供了理论和技术基础。
AI.conclusion: 该视角旨在促进极化状态调控替代手段的发展，推动铁电基应用的进步，为超越传统电场调控方法提供了新的研究方向和可能性。

title: Universality of Type-II Multiferroicity in Monolayer Nickel Dihalides
summary: The recent discovery of type-II multiferroicity in monolayer NiI${_2}$ indicated a new pathway for intrinsic magnetoelectric coupling in the two-dimensional limit. However, determining whether this phenomenon is a unique anomaly or a general, chemically tunable property of the material class remains unresolved. Here, we demonstrate the universality of type-II multiferroicity in the transition metal dihalides by visualizing the ferroelectric order in monolayer NiBr${_2}$. Using scanning tunneling microscopy (STM), we resolve atomic-scale ferroelectric domains and confirm their magnetoelectric origin through reciprocal manipulation experiments: reorienting magnetic order via electric fields and suppressing the electric polarization with external magnetic fields. Furthermore, we find that the multiferroic state in NiBr${_2}$ is energetically less robust than in its iodide counterpart, consistent with modified superexchange interactions and the reduced spin-orbit coupling. Our results establish the transition metal dihalides as a versatile platform where the stability of magnetoelectric phases can be engineered through chemical substitution.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过扫描隧道显微镜证实了单层NiBr₂中的II型多铁性，证明了过渡金属二卤化物中多铁性的普遍性，并展示了通过化学取代调控磁电相稳定性的能力。
AI.motivation: 先前在单层NiI₂中发现的II型多铁性表明二维极限下存在本征磁电耦合的新途径，但需要确定这种现象是该材料的独特异常还是整个材料类的普遍、可化学调控的性质。
AI.method: 使用扫描隧道显微镜（STM）在原子尺度上解析单层NiBr₂的铁电畴，并通过互易操控实验确认其磁电起源：用电场重新定向磁序，用外加磁场抑制电极化。
AI.result: 成功观测到单层NiBr₂中的铁电畴，证实了II型多铁性在过渡金属二卤化物中的普遍性。发现NiBr₂的多铁态比其碘化物对应物能量稳定性较低，这与改进的超交换相互作用和降低的自旋轨道耦合一致。
AI.conclusion: 研究确立了过渡金属二卤化物作为一个多功能平台，其中磁电相的稳定性可以通过化学取代进行工程化调控。

title: Morphological Stability of Metal Anodes: Roles of Solid Electrolyte Interphases (SEIs) and Desolvation Kinetics
summary: Achieving stable lithium metal anodes requires control over the solid-electrolyte interphase (SEI) and desolvation kinetics. Here, we develop a unified theoretical framework integrating ion transport, desolvation, charge transfer, and SEI breakdown to predict morphological instabilities during electrodeposition. Using linear stability analysis, we identify six dimensionless parameters that govern the onset and evolution of instabilities. We show that SEI transport and desolvation rate effectively modulate apparent reaction kinetics, shifting the system toward a stable, reaction-limited regime. Extending the classical limiting current concept, we demonstrate that a thick, poorly conductive SEI and sluggish desolvation significantly reduce the limiting current. We introduce an apparent Damköhler number to quantify the critical balance: suppressing diffusion-limited instabilities by reaction rate reduction, while maintaining a high limiting current. Our theory enables predictive mapping of electrodeposition morphologies across diverse materials and operating conditions, guiding the rational design of stable lithium metal anodes.

AI.tldr: 提出统一理论框架预测锂金属电极沉积过程中的形态不稳定性，通过六个无量纲参数控制，引入表观Damköhler数平衡反应与扩散限制，指导稳定锂金属负极设计。
AI.motivation: 实现稳定的锂金属负极需要控制固体电解质界面（SEI）和去溶剂化动力学。目前缺乏一个统一的理论框架来预测电沉积过程中的形态不稳定性，这阻碍了锂金属电池的理性设计。
AI.method: 开发了一个统一的理论框架，整合离子传输、去溶剂化、电荷转移和SEI分解过程。采用线性稳定性分析，识别出六个控制不稳定性发生和演化的无量纲参数。引入表观Damköhler数来量化临界平衡。
AI.result: 发现SEI传输和去溶剂化速率能有效调节表观反应动力学，使系统向稳定的反应限制机制转变。厚且导电性差的SEI以及缓慢的去溶剂化会显著降低极限电流。理论能够预测不同材料和操作条件下的电沉积形态。
AI.conclusion: 该理论框架为预测锂金属电极沉积形态提供了统一方法，通过控制SEI性质和去溶剂化动力学可以抑制不稳定性，同时保持高极限电流，为设计稳定的锂金属负极提供了指导原则。

title: Millisecond spin coherence of electrons in semiconducting perovskites revealed by spin mode locking
summary: Long spin coherence times of carriers are essential for implementing quantum technologies using semiconductor devices for which, however, a possible obstacle is spin relaxation. For the spin dynamics, decisive features are the band structure, crystal symmetry, and quantum confinement. Perovskite semiconductors recently have come into focus of studies of their spin states, notivated by efficient optical access and potentially long-living coherence. Here, we report an electron spin coherence time $T_2$ of the order of 1 ms, measured for a bulk FA$_{0.95}$Cs$_{0.05}$PbI$_3$ lead halide perovskite crystal. Using periodic laser pulses, we synchronize the electron spin Larmor precession about an external magnetic field in an inhomogeneous ensemble, the effect known as spin mode locking. It appears as a decay of the optically created ensemble spin polarization within the dephasing time $T_2^*$ of up to 20 ns and its revival during the spin coherence time $T_2$ reaching the millisecond range. This exceptionally long spin coherence time in a bulk crystal is complemented by millisecond-long longitudinal spin relaxation times $T_1$ for electrons and holes, measured by optically-detected magnetic resonance. These long-lasting spin dynamics highlight perovskites as promising platform for the quantum devices with all-optical control.

AI.tldr: 该研究在FA₀.₉₅Cs₀.₀₅PbI₃钙钛矿晶体中实现了约1毫秒的电子自旋相干时间，这是块体材料中异常长的自旋相干时间，为钙钛矿量子器件应用提供了重要基础。
AI.motivation: 半导体量子技术需要长的自旋相干时间，但自旋弛豫是一个主要障碍。钙钛矿半导体因其高效光学控制和潜在的长寿命相干特性而受到关注，但需要实验验证其自旋相干性能。
AI.method: 使用周期性激光脉冲实现自旋模式锁定技术，通过同步电子自旋拉莫尔进动来测量自旋相干时间。同时采用光探测磁共振测量纵向自旋弛豫时间。
AI.result: 在FA₀.₉₅Cs₀.₀₅PbI₃钙钛矿块体晶体中测得约1毫秒的电子自旋相干时间T₂，退相干时间T₂*可达20纳秒，电子和空穴的纵向自旋弛豫时间T₁也达到毫秒量级。
AI.conclusion: 钙钛矿具有异常长的自旋相干时间，结合其高效光学控制特性，使其成为实现全光学控制量子器件的理想平台。
